title: Receptionist Job at Sonia Medical Laboratory and Diagnostics
content:
Sonia Medical Laboratory and Diagnostics is a state-of-the-art facility providing high-quality medical laboratory services. Our team of experienced professionals utilizes advanced technology to deliver accurate and reliable test results.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location: Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT) 

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a friendly and organized Receptionist to join our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for managing the front desk, handling patient registration, and providing excellent customer service.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet patients and visitors, and provide excellent customer service
	Manage patient registration, scheduling, and records
	Handle phone calls, emails, and messages
	Maintain a clean and organized reception area
	Perform administrative tasks as needed.


Requirements


	1 - 2 years of experience in a reception or customer-facing role.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work accurately and efficiently
	Basic computer skills and knowledge of Microsoft Office.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Soniamedlab@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: On Air Personality Job at Glow FM
content:
Glow FM Akure is a vibrant and popular radio station broadcasting from the heart of Akure, Ondo State, Nigeria. With a frequency of 99.1 FM, the station has become a household name in the region, entertaining and informing a wide audience of listeners.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: On Air Personality
Job Location: Akure, Ondo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Got the gift of gab? The kind of voice that turns heads and lifts spirits.
	Glow FM 99.1 is turning up the volume, and we want you behind the mic.
	We are searching for a bold, magnetic, and unstoppable on-Air-personality to bring fire, favor and unforgettable vibes to our show.


Requirements
If you’ve got:


	Experience 2-5 Years
	Qualification – Minimum OND in any discipline
	A voice that vibes
	A mind full of fresh ideas
	And a heart that beats for the people
	Good in Yoruba or English or both
	Location – Akure, Ondo State
	Salary – Depends on qualification, Competitive
	We help with housing


Salary
N50,000 - N100,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Demo to: glow991fm@gmail.com using the Job Positon as the subject of the mail.

Note: Glow FM 99.1 – More than radio. It’s a movement. Be the voice of it.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Logistics Supervisor Job at Nestoil Plc
content:
Nestoil Plc was incorporated in Nigeria in 1991 for the provision of Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC) services to the energy and oil & gas industry. Since then, Nestoil has grown to become the leading indigenous EPC provider for major IOCs (International Oil Companies) in Sub-Saharan Africa like National Petroleum Company (NNPC) Shell, Exxon Mobil, Chevron, Total, etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Logistics Supervisor

Job Location: Warri, Delta
Job Type: Full-time 

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are on an evolutionary journey where we’re changing our story. We are looking to hire an experienced Logistics Supervisor to join our diverse team in our Company.
	This role you will be responsible for the planning of assets and material movement across different project sites and locations 


As a Logistics Supervisor, you will be responsible for


	Ensuring documentation is accurately processed, distributed and released to carriers, forwarders, customers and agents in a timely manner.
	Preparing budget for operations inclusive of logistics contingency plans.
	Ensuring effective execution of logistic plans.
	Managing logistics operations including material and personnel
	Identifying, planning and managing special logistics operations. 
	Ensuring effective material/diesel usage and generate appropriate receipts
	Guiding and coaching team members
	Coordinate logistics activities with procurement, finance, PMTs and other substantive units. 
	Preparing reports on personnel and material movements and other operational logistics issues
	Participating in technical survey missions for new projects and pre-deployment verification visits to sites/locations
	Coordinating/attending toolbox and HSE meetings.
	Performing any other duty as may be assigned by your supervisor


What are we looking for?


	Bachelor's Degree / HND in a related field
	5+ years of experience in Supply Chain, Inventory / Warehouse / Logistics Management for a drilling contractor.
	Strong personal initiative and willingness to accept responsibilities
	Excellent grasp of logistics operations and practices.
	Organization and coordination skills
	Teaming & Interpersonal skills
	Good computer skills – Excel & MS Word
	Communication skills 
	Stock taking and inventory management skills
	Vendor Management skills 
	Client orientation 
	Good Knowledge of safety procedures.
    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

title: Receptionist Job at Esporta Suites Hotel and Resorts Limited
keyword: esporta suites hotel and resorts limited
content:
At Esporta Hotels, we are committed to excellence in hospitality and service. Our property offers a warm and welcoming environment for both guests and staff. We believe in professionalism, teamwork, and providing opportunities for growth within our organization.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Greet guests warmly and handle check-in/check-out procedures
	Manage reservations, phone calls, and emails professionally
	Provide information about services, local attractions, and room availability
	Handle guest complaints and requests promptly and courteously
	Maintain a tidy and welcoming reception area
	Coordinate with housekeeping, bell desk, and other departments.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree / HND / OND with 1 - 3 years of experience
	Previous experience in a front office or customer service role preferred
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Proficiency in basic computer systems (e.g., MS Office, PMS software)
	Well-groomed, professional appearance
	Ability to work in shifts, including weekends and holidays
	Fluency in English; additional languages are a plus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@esportahotels.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

title: Job Vacancies at Sonia Medical Laboratory and Diagnostics
content:
Sonia Medical Laboratory and Diagnostics is a state-of-the-art facility providing high-quality medical laboratory services. Our team of experienced professionals utilizes advanced technology to deliver accurate and reliable test results.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Medical Laboratory Scientist

Job Location: Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly skilled Medical Laboratory Scientist to join our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for conducting complex laboratory tests and procedures, interpreting results, and providing expert advice to healthcare professionals.


Key Responsibilities


	Conduct complex laboratory tests and procedures using advanced equipment and techniques
	Interpret and report test results accurately and efficiently
	Develop and implement new laboratory procedures and protocols
	Supervise and train laboratory staff
	Collaborate with healthcare professionals to provide expert advice and support


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree in Medical Laboratory Science or related field
	2-5 years of experience in a medical laboratory setting
	Strong analytical, technical, and leadership skills
	Ability to work accurately and efficiently
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Certifications and Licenses:


	Registered with the Medical Laboratory Science Council of Nigeria (MLSCN)


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Soniamedlab@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Medical Laboratory Technician

Job Location: Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT) 

Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled Medical Laboratory Technician to join our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for conducting laboratory tests and procedures to assist in the diagnosis and treatment of patients.


Key Responsibilities


	Collect and prepare patient samples for testing
	Conduct laboratory tests and procedures using various equipment and techniques
	Record and report test results accurately and efficiently
	Maintain laboratory equipment and ensure proper functioning
	Adhere to safety protocols and standards.


Requirements


	National Diploma (ND) or Higher National Diploma (HND) in Medical Laboratory Science or related field
	1-2 years of experience in a medical laboratory setting
	Relevant certification
	Strong analytical and technical skills
	Ability to work accurately and efficiently
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Certifications and Licenses:


	Registered with the Medical Laboratory Science Council of Nigeria (MLSCN)


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Soniamedlab@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

3.) Receptionist

Job Location: Gwarinpa, Abuja (FCT) 

Job Summary


	We are seeking a friendly and organized Receptionist to join our team.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for managing the front desk, handling patient registration, and providing excellent customer service.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet patients and visitors, and provide excellent customer service
	Manage patient registration, scheduling, and records
	Maintain a clean and organized reception area
	Handle phone calls, emails, and messages
	Perform administrative tasks as needed.


Requirements


	1 - 2 years of experience in a reception or customer-facing role.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work accurately and efficiently
	Basic computer skills and knowledge of Microsoft Office.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Soniamedlab@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
